page.title: 09Village Personalities
page.content: The old characters of the village who could be persuaded to sup a pint of ale, and recount tales ofthe good old days? when milk was delivered in a churn carried on a milk float,cigarettes were 2d for 10, bread 2d a loaf baked in the local bakery, and a farthing would buy a gobstopper, licorice lace,or a sugar mouse are fast disappearing. Farm workers were paid for a holiday on Good Friday providing they attended church and then planted their gardens.Shallots should always be planted on this day t'is said.Nowadays farm workers get paid annual leave. It is important that these tales are collected and printed for future generations to read
